name: Bottle Smash - Team Won't Wake Up
name_original: Bottle Smash - Team Won't Wake Up
description:
A GBA emulator is required to play this game. Move the cheese side to side, and throw the cricket ball at the bottles and glasses.

GBA Controls are left and right buttons to move, A button to throw.

Default PC controls are left and right arrow keys to move, Z key to throw.
